mapper.insert: insert into goods (name, categoryId, price, stock, description) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{description})
mapper.select: select * from goods order by id desc

select g.id, g.name, g.categoryId, g.price, g.stock, g.description, g.imgUrl, g.reg_date, gc.categoryIdRef, gc.name as secondCategoryName from goods g inner join goods_category gc on g.categoryId = gc.id where g.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update goods set name = #{name}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
